title: Bubble Level for Wear
summary: Indispensable tool for angle measuring, now at your fingertips on your watch!
description: Indispensable tool for angle and slope measuring, now always at your fingertips on your Android Wear watches!For Android Wear ONLY!A spirit level, bubble level or simply a level (clinometer) is an instrument designed to measure an inclination of surfaces, enabling you to tell whether a surface is horizontal (level) or vertical (plumb). Specially designed for Android Wear watches, allows you to measure the surfaces whenever you need it.-Simple, yet powerful and polished design for both round and square watches-3 types of the tool (bulls eye, vertical and horizontal flat level)-Precise measuring with numerical angles (in degrees)-Adjustable ranges-Calibration for less precise devices-5 different skins
descriptionHTML:
Indispensable tool for angle and slope measuring, now always at your fingertips on your Android Wear watches!

For Android Wear ONLY!

A spirit level, bubble level or simply a level (clinometer) is an instrument designed to measure an inclination of surfaces, enabling you to tell whether a surface is horizontal (level) or vertical (plumb).

Specially designed for Android Wear watches, allows you to measure the surfaces whenever you need it.

-Simple, yet powerful and polished design for both round and square watches
-3 types of the tool (bulls eye, vertical and horizontal flat level)
-Precise measuring with numerical angles (in degrees)
-Adjustable ranges
-Calibration for less precise devices
-5 different skins
comments: Doesn't load Not visible once installed.  Tried syncing and that didn't work.  No way to access the app. I'm on samsung galaxy with kit kat 4.4 and moto 360 with latest update.
The bubble even animates like a real bubble!
Worked for me on LG G Watch R! Simple, nice, and well done!
Unfortunately, it doesn't work on the LG style watch. Great idea though!
